whoWeAre.title: About MedEminence
whoWeAre.highlight: MedEminence is a medical tourism facilitation and healthcare coordination platform focused on assisting international patients seeking treatment in India.
whoWeAre.p1: We work as a non-clinical intermediary, supporting patients throughout their healthcare journey by coordinating with accredited hospitals, licensed medical professionals, and trusted healthcare service providers.
whoWeAre.p2: Our role is to simplify complex cross-border healthcare processes by offering structured coordination, transparent communication, and logistical support. We assist patients and families who may face challenges related to distance, language, unfamiliar healthcare systems, and travel planning.

purpose.title: What We Do & What We Do Not Do
purpose.desc: MedEminence collaborates only with hospitals and healthcare providers that meet recognized accreditation, regulatory, and professional standards. Every medical case is reviewed directly by the healthcare provider, ensuring that clinical decisions remain solely in the hands of qualified professionals.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
items: Coordinate medical case reviews with hospitals and specialists
Assist with treatment pathway planning and travel logistics
Support accommodation and local arrangements near hospitals
Facilitate communication between patients and healthcare providers

whatWeDoNot.title: What We Do Not Do (Non-Clinical Disclaimer)
whatWeDoNot.desc: MedEminence does not provide medical diagnosis, prescriptions, or treatment. All clinical decisions, treatment plans, and medical outcomes are determined exclusively by licensed healthcare providers.

timeliness.title: Structured Facilitation
timeliness.desc: Ethical and organized healthcare coordination model

transparency.title: Accredited Partnerships
transparency.desc: Collaboration with recognized hospitals and licensed professionals

patient.title: Transparent Coordination

privacy.title: Clear Separation

support.title: Coordination Partner
support.desc: We act as a facilitation platform, not a healthcare provider

cta.title: Start Your Coordinated Healthcare Journey
cta.desc: Share your medical details for structured coordination with accredited healthcare providers in India.

whyChoose.title: Our Coordination Commitment
points: Collaboration with accredited hospitals and licensed professionals
Clear separation between medical decision-making and facilitation services
